titleStmt.title: The heavenly cloud now breaking the Lord Christ's ascension-ladder sent down to shew the way to reach the ascension and glorification through the death and resurrection / by J. Leade.
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of text.
